column4: of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court and Topchun Long
column6: announced the verdict of two Chinese nationals  on the afternoon of March 1
column7: 2019. Two accused were imprisoned for life and fined 60 million riels for trafficking of drugs.------The first defendant. Lai Kuan Yu
column8: a 24-year-old Taiwanese and Lin Chen Chia
column9: a 29-year-old Chinese man were arrested on July 10
column10: 2018 at the Post Office of Cambodia Post in Wat Phnom
column11: ------The two  were detained while waiting to receive drugs from Germany.  Police seized 1008.37 grams of MDMA in closed containers. ------CAMPOST------
